Check the link to get the story on Milliom Mom Marchers:
 
 http://www.tincher.to/mmm.htm

post_info.post_title: Save the kids, join the Million Mom Marchers

I must say the MMM has a different idea on how best to save kids than I do.

This is spam because the same subject keeps being brought up. This subject has already been discussed in two other threads.
 
 You must be joking. You can't stereotype the whole MMM based on the actions of one individual.

Sorry for the spam, but the thread just disappeared.
 
 But here is some further goodies on the MMM:
 
 http://www.naawp.com/news/million_mom_march_fraud.htm
 
 They are going to jail for not paying taxes. No way do I endorse the politcs of the site.
And the anti gun media stereotypes gun owners by the crimes of criminals.

Don't forget that the pro-gun crowd also likes to stereotype those in favor of gun-control as communists and Nazis. Being stereotyped as a communist isn't bad, but being stereotyped as a Nazi is extremely insulting. Being compared to an evil dictator like Hitler is unforgivable.

Voiceofreason:
 
 How do you protect yourself? Regardless of what your local crime rate is, high or low? You do defend yourself. You may use a cell phone, you may aviod danger by using smarts, you may rely on combined saftey from neighbors, you may use mace, or you may use a .45?
 
 I use a .45 because a phone call to the cops or a yell for help is too slow. I will always use a weapon of somekind even if you can promise that all felons will be reduced to using pointy sticks.
 
 What do you use?
 
 In my town a 100 lb woman shot and killed an unarmed attacker at a shopping mall. The felon was 6 ft tall and more that 270 lbs. The judge rulled it justified because if the criminal got his hands on her it would have been her death. Does a 100 lb woman use a knife? at arm length with a felon?
 
 I have to add, it is illegal to carry a firearm into a shopping mall. If she did obey the law, she would be dead.

Saving the kids at school is about keep guns away from troubled teens. Gun control only treats the symptom not the infection.
 
 Our country has a problem with violence, not guns. 
 
 http://www.nsc.org/pubs/fsh/archive/fall99/teens.htm
 
 Gun control will not cure a troubled teen. With gun control you take way his guns, but they are still troubled. Instead they just go and build a bomb!
 
 "According to a report by the Department of Education, approximately 6,000 students were expelled during the 1996-97 school year for bringing firearms or explosives to school. "Some children and adolescents view weapons as a way of dealing with revenge, hurt or anger," says Charles Thompson, a professor of counselor education and counseling psychology at the University of Tennessee in Knoxville. " -National Saftey Council.

"Not one person I asked believed that guns should be banned. "
 
 http://www.mom-mom.com/million_mom_march.htm
 
 Does anyone believe the above quote? I don't. The day I joined the NRA was the day of the Million Mom March in Washington DC. I very clearly remember surfing the TV and stopping to watch a speach. Very clearly one of the speakers said, "First we get all the guns, then we put them on ship, then we sink the ship." After about 5 years as a gun owner I never joing the NRA. That moment I looked up the NRA website and joined.
